title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and Docker-style model management.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, managing models and multi-user workspaces; runs in Docker.

title: chainlit/chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit cookbook showing how to build conversational UIs backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for production pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight Go CLI for interactive chatting with Ollama models from the terminal with markdown rendering.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that lets you call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama with strong typing and async streaming; NuGet package OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub as ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting and feature requests around the Ollama ecosystem.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing the launch of Ollama v0.1.40 with concurrent model loading and ARM64 Windows support.

title: ollama-youtube-traversy
summary: Traversy Media tutorial showing how to install Ollama, pull models and build a Node/Express chatbot with streaming responses.

title: ollama-blog-localai
summary: Comparison post outlining differences between Ollama and LocalAI for self-hosted inference.

title: ollama-npm-search
summary: NPM search listing community packages like ollama-chat, ollama-sdk, and ollama-rag-helper.
